## Email Addresses

- [ ] I have Fully tested with Invalid and valid email addresses

### Must be:

- [ ] Length>=5
- [ ] Length<=10
 
### Invalid Data:
- [ ] _@_.com
- [ ] @.com
- [ ] @ .com
- [ ] .@.com
- [ ] a.@a.com
- [ ] @a.com
- [ ] .a@.m
- [ ] a.a@.com
- [ ] plainaddress
- [ ] #@%^%#$@#$@#.com
- [ ] @example.com
- [ ] email.example.com
- [ ] email@example@example.com
- [ ] .email@example.com
- [ ] email.@example.com
- [ ] email..email@example.com
- [ ] email@example.com (Joe Smith)
- [ ] email@example
- [ ] email@-example.com
- [ ] email@111.222.333.44444
- [ ] email@example..com
- [ ] Abc..123@example.com
- [ ] 12.abc@.1234.com
- [ ] z@..com
